dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is a large-scale dataset for 3D object detection, providing various driving scenarios with annotated data for pedestrians, vehicles, and cyclists.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:description: JRDB is a human-centric dataset containing over 1.8 million 3D cuboids surrounding pedestrians in both indoor and outdoor settings, designed for egocentric robot visual perception.
dcterms:title: JRDB

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, providing a diverse set of driving scenarios with annotations for 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: nuScenes
